Contact Us

Email the Mayor and Town Council simultaneously. Please note, all correspondence received is considered a public record and therefore may be subject to disclosure under the Texas Public Information Act .

Flower Mound Town Council Members are elected “at-large”  for a 3-year term with term limits of no more than two full consecutive terms and the allowance of two additional terms if a councilmember becomes mayor.

All powers of the Town, and the determination of all matters of policy, are vested in the Town Council. The powers of the council include, but are not limited to, adoption of the annual Town budget , appointment of a Town Manager , Town Secretary , Town Attorney , and Municipal Judge , and provide vision and direction for all Town policies and initiatives.
